005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint;
007
008import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
009import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
010
011/**
012 * Provides builder methods for the core data elements of an
013 * {@link IConstraint}.
014 * <p>
015 * The base class of all constraint builders.
016 *
017 * @param <T>
018 *          the Java type of the implementing builder
019 * @param <R>
020 *          the Java type of the resulting built object
021 * @since 2.0.0
022 */
023public abstract class AbstractConfigurableMessageConstraintBuilder<
024    T extends AbstractConfigurableMessageConstraintBuilder<T, R>,
025    R extends IConfigurableMessageConstraint>
026    extends AbstractConstraintBuilder<T, R> {
027  private String message;
028
029  /**
030   * A message to emit when the constraint is violated. Allows embedded Metapath
031   * expressions using the syntax {@code \{ metapath \}}.
032   *
033   * @param message
034   *          the message if defined or {@code null} otherwise
035   * @return this builder
036   */
037  @NonNull
038  public T message(@NonNull String message) {
039    this.message = message;
040    return getThis();
041  }
042
043  /**
044   * Get the constraint message provided to the builder.
045   *
046   * @return the message or {@code null} if no message is set
047   */
048  @Nullable
049  protected String getMessage() {
050    return message;
051  }
052}
